name: TV Tropes colorful links
description: Makes the links on <dfn>TV Tropes</dfn> articles stick out more, and colors visited links differently from unvisited ones.
additional_info:
Changes
  • July 30, 2013
    • Links are now colored when selecting spoilers.
    • Proper link matching in the sidebar.
  • January 11, 2015
    • Only the color of the links are affected now that TV Tropes has gotten rid of their old flashy design. The name of the user style has therefore been changed from “TV Tropes simplified” to “TV Tropes colorful links”.
